script.name: Dock Administrator
script.script_contents:
#!/bin/bash dockItems=( 'Launchpad.app' 'Self Service.app' 'Safari.app' 'Utilities/Terminal.app' 'Utilities/Disk Utility.app' 'Utilities/Console.app' 'Utilities/Activity Monitor.app' 'Utilities/Keychain Access.app' 'System Preferences.app' )
dockFolders=( '~/Downloads' )
if [ $(/usr/local/bin/currentuser) == "admin" ]; then
su -l "$(/usr/local/bin/currentuser)" -c "/usr/bin/defaults delete com.apple.dock" su -l "$(/usr/local/bin/currentuser)" -c "/usr/bin/osascript -e 'tell app \"Dock\" to quit'" su -l "$(/usr/local/bin/currentuser)" -c "/usr/local/bin/dockutil --remove all --no-restart" && sleep 2
for ((i = 0; i < "${#dockItems[@]}"; i++)); do su -l "$(/usr/local/bin/currentuser)" -c "/usr/local/bin/dockutil --add '/Applications/${dockItems[$i]}' --no-restart" done
for ((i = 0; i < "${#dockFolders[@]}"; i++)); do su -l "$(/usr/local/bin/currentuser)" -c "/usr/local/bin/dockutil --add '${dockFolders[$i]}' --view grid --display folder --no-restart" done
su -l "$(/usr/local/bin/currentuser)" -c "/usr/bin/defaults write com.apple.dock tilesize -int 50"
su -l "$(/usr/local/bin/currentuser)" -c "/usr/bin/osascript -e 'tell app \"Dock\" to quit'"
fi
